text: Va [ej musulmonon] sumoro ci mesavad, ki az on ci nomi Alloh taolo ʙar on ʙurdasudaast, namexured? Hol on ki [Alloh taolo] on ciro ʙar sumo harom kardaast, ʙa tafsil ʙarojaton ʙajon dostaast [pas, az onho duri kuned] magar cize, ki ʙa [xurdani] on nocor saved va ʙe tardid, ʙisjore [az mardum digaronro] az ruji nodoni ʙo havashoi xes gumroh mekunand. [Ej pajomʙar] Jaqinan, Parvardigorat ʙa [holi] tacovuzkoron [az hududi ilohi] donotar ast
